variable.name: CTFLAG
variable.comment: Indicates if a participant has been randomized to one or more of the Clinical Trial components (HRT, CAD, DM).

variable.name: OSFLAG
variable.comment: Indicates if a participant has been enrolled into the Observational Study.

variable.name: HRTFLAG
variable.comment: Indicates if a participant has been randomized to the Hormone Replacement Therapy Trial.

variable.name: DMFLAG
variable.comment: Indicates if a participant has been randomized to the Dietary Modification Trial.

variable.name: CADFLAG
variable.comment: Indicates if a participant has been randomized to the Calcium and Vitamin D Trial.

variable.name: HRTARM
variable.comment: Hormone Replacement Therapy study arm to which the participant was randomized

variable.name: DMARM
variable.comment: Dietary Modification study arm to which the participant was randomized

variable.name: CADARM
variable.comment: Calcium and vitamin D study arm to which the participant was randomized

variable.name: CADDAYS
variable.description: Days since CT randomization to CAD randomization

variable.name: BMDFLAG
variable.comment: Indicates if the participant was randomized or enrolled at a bone density clinic and was not randomized or enrolled as a part of enhanced recruitment for that clinic.

variable.name: AGESTRAT
variable.description: Age stratum at randomization or enrollment
variable.comment: Based on the birth date reported by the participant at the time of randomization or enrollment. Categorization of the Age at Screening variable may differ due to participants requesting a correction to their Form 2 birth date after randomization.

variable.name: REGION
variable.comment: Residence at the time of randomization or enrollment. Four categories based on US Census definition.
